item.title: Yell command problem
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Know what a good way to stop them is?
When they yell, make it only send the message to them so they don’t know that the censor is blocking it.
Then they won’t know to evade it. 

if (command.startsWith("yell")) {
    String censoredWords = { "no-ip", "servegame", "www", "com" };
    String msg = command.substring(5).toLowerCase();
    for(String s : censoredWords) {
        if(msg.contains(s)) {
            sendMessage("[" + playerName + "] : " + msg);
            return;
        }
    }
    PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[" + playerName + "] : " + msg;
}

And if you’re curious as to why your way wasn’t working, the replaceAll method returns a String with all the specified words replaced. You weren’t using the returned value for anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command problem
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Why not just disconnect them?

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if(command.contains("no-ip") || command.contains("servegame") || command.contains("www") || command.contains("com")) { disconnected = true; } else { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "["+playerName + "] : " + command.substring(5); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command problem
item.dc:creator: @Unknown_Supreme Unknown Supreme
item.description:
@Unknown_Supreme wrote:

[quote=“geeno, post:5, topic:275119”]here is mine hope it helps…

Code:
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && (command.length() > 5)) {
if (!muted) {
String text = command.substring(5);
String[] bad = { “chalreq”, “duelreq”, “tradereq” };
for (String element : bad) {
if (text.indexOf(element) >= 0) {
return;
}
}
lastMessage[0] = lastMessage[1];
lastMessage[1] = lastMessage[2];
lastMessage[2] = Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
+ text.substring(1);
if (lastMessage[0].equals(lastMessage[1])
&& lastMessage[1].equals(lastMessage[2]))
sendMessage(playerName + ": "
+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
+ text.substring(1));
else
yell(playerName + ": "
+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
+ text.substring(1));
} else
sendMessage(playerName + ": " + command.substring(5));
}[/quote]

Please use a casing, and that’s not my problem. I need help on the CENSORS.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command problem
item.dc:creator: @geeno geeno
item.description:
@geeno wrote:

here is mine hope it helps…

Code:
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && (command.length() > 5)) {
if (!muted) {
String text = command.substring(5);
String[] bad = { “chalreq”, “duelreq”, “tradereq” };
for (String element : bad) {
if (text.indexOf(element) >= 0) {
return;
}
}
lastMessage[0] = lastMessage[1];
lastMessage[1] = lastMessage[2];
lastMessage[2] = Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
+ text.substring(1);
if (lastMessage[0].equals(lastMessage[1])
&& lastMessage[1].equals(lastMessage[2]))
sendMessage(playerName + ": "
+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
+ text.substring(1));
else
yell(playerName + ": "
+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
+ text.substring(1));
} else
sendMessage(playerName + ": " + command.substring(5));
}

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command problem
item.dc:creator: @Unknown_Supreme Unknown Supreme
item.description:
@Unknown_Supreme wrote:

Ok so this is my yell command

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "["+playerName + "] : " + command.substring(5); } try { command.replaceAll("no-ip", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll("servegame", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll("www", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll("www.", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll(".com", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll("com", "[Censor]"); command.trim();

However, if I yell no-ip, servegame, etc. it doesnt replace it with [Censor]. Any help?

Read full topic
